resources.string: Accompany a grandparent through calls , video calls , visits to a residence or great events
Weekly meetings in the residences to enjoy the company in the first person
Connect from anywhere in the world
"Crafting Moments, Celebrating Memories: Events Curated Just for You!"
"Supporting Seniors, One Donation at a Time: Bridge Generations with a Kind Gesture."
Thanks to your collaboration,the elderly can participate for free and enjoy the company of our volunteers
By clicking “Log in”, you agree with our Terms .Learn how we process your data in our Privacy Policy and cookies policy.
When you tap “Create account” , Bridging the gap will create your account . Message and data rates may apply. The verified email-id can be used to log in.
Your age information will be updated on your profile page and this will displayed publicly on your dashboard
Write a short intro to help other members know a bit about you . You don’t need to write much , just 100 characters!
Describe who you are , where you grew up.\nWhat your interests are, etc.
This must be a clear and recent photo of your face
